code: import{ActionType}from"../type/productType";export var setProducts=function setProducts(products){return{type:ActionType.SET_PRODUCT,payload:products};};export var selectedProduct=function selectedProduct(product){return{type:ActionType.SELECTED_PRODUCT,payload:product};};export var removeSelectedProduct=function removeSelectedProduct(){return{type:ActionType.REMOVE_SELECTED_PRODUCT};};export var searchProduct=function searchProduct(prodect){return{type:ActionType.SEARCH_PRODUCT,payload:prodect};};export var questionProduct=function questionProduct(question){return{type:ActionType.QUESTION_PRODUCT,payload:question};};export var loginSuccess=function loginSuccess(){return{type:ActionType.LOGIN_SUCCESS};};export var loginFail=function loginFail(){return{type:ActionType.LOGIN_FAIL};};export var vendorSuccess=function vendorSuccess(){return{type:ActionType.VENDOR_SUCCESS};};export var vendorFail=function vendorFail(){return{type:ActionType.VENDOR_FAIL};};
